step_feedback.feedback: You're doing a great job keeping your arm overhead. Try to keep your wrist and elbow a little straighter to maximize the pumping action.
Good job extending your arm overhead. Focus on making a tighter fist and engaging your muscles more during this step.
Excellent! You're opening your hand wide and relaxing well. Keep up the good work with the fluid visualization.
Fantastic! You're making a strong fist and tightening your muscles effectively. Continue to exhale and relax fully.

exercise_summary: You're doing well with the overhead arm stretch and opening your hand. Focus on making a tighter fist and engaging your muscles more when you inhale. Remember to relax fully as you exhale.
